bug.author: cd-rum
bug.summary: [BUG] ValueError: time data ... does not match format
bug.description:
In manual mode while sharing internet from a Debian host my RPi0 1.3 (no W, I use a dongle) throws a value error. I expected it to run in manual mode. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/12165422/67071932-8269b200-f1cf-11e9-9e29-502b83ddad90.png></denchmark-link>
Running RC5 on a Debian host.
